# TheirStack Documentation

## datasets

- [Datasets](https://theirstack.com/en/docs/datasets): Learn about the different datasets available in TheirStack.

## product-updates

- [Product updates](https://theirstack.com/en/docs/product-updates): Track the latest product updates and feature releases

## teams

- [Users and Teams](https://theirstack.com/en/docs/teams): Learn about users and teams in TheirStack.

## webhooks

- [Webhooks](https://theirstack.com/en/docs/webhooks): Learn how to use webhooks to get notified when events occur (new jobs, tech changes, etc) in TheirStack and trigger actions in your external systems like N8N, Zapier, Make, Airtable, etc

## what-is-theirstack

- [What is TheirStack](https://theirstack.com/en/docs/what-is-theirstack):  

## api

- [Free count](https://theirstack.com/en/docs/api/free-count): Learn how to get the count of records that match your search criteria without consuming API credits.
- [Preview data mode](https://theirstack.com/en/docs/api/preview-data-mode): Learn how to preview TheirStack data without consuming API credits.

## app

- [Company lookup](https://theirstack.com/en/docs/app/company-lookup): Easily search for any company name or website on TheirStack. View their technologies and job listings with a simple click.
- [Find companies by technology stack](https://theirstack.com/en/docs/app/company-search): How to generate a report of companies using a technology or group of technologies.
- [App](https://theirstack.com/en/docs/app): Effortlessly explore, search, and analyze our data with an intuitive, user-friendly interfaceâ€”no coding required.
- [Find people](https://theirstack.com/en/docs/app/contact-data/find-people): Finding email and phone number data with tools TheirStack integrates with
- [Hiring Manager](https://theirstack.com/en/docs/app/contact-data/hiring-manager): TheirStack provides the name, role and LinkedIn URL for the people in the hiring team for many jobs. Available via UI and API
- [Contact data](https://theirstack.com/en/docs/app/contact-data): Discover how TheirStack can assist you in obtaining personal contact data through our leading data partners or our hiring manager details
- [Excluding recruiting agencies](https://theirstack.com/en/docs/app/job-search/excluding-recruiting-agencies): Learn which filters can help you exclude jobs from recruiting agencies or consulting firms.
- [Job Search](https://theirstack.com/en/docs/app/job-search): How to find companies hiring by filtering through millions of listings worldwide. Discover how to refine your search using over 20 job and company filters, making it easier to target your ideal opportunities.
- [Tech jobs only](https://theirstack.com/en/docs/app/job-search/tech-jobs-only): Learn which filters can help you get only tech jobs like software engineer, data analyst, DevOps, UX...

## comparisons

- [TheirStack vs BrightData](https://theirstack.com/en/docs/comparisons/theirstack-vs-brightdata): Looking for the best job data solution? Compare TheirStack and BrightData side by side. While BrightData offers basic job scraping for platforms like LinkedIn and Indeed, TheirStack provides a comprehensive, real-time job data platform with advanced filtering, instant results, and seamless integration. Discover which solution best fits your needs in this detailed comparison guide.
- [TheirStack vs BuiltWith](https://theirstack.com/en/docs/comparisons/theirstack-vs-builtwith): Compare TheirStack and BuiltWith to find the best technographic database for your needs. Learn how TheirStack offers broader technology coverage, real-time webhooks, and confidence scoring, while BuiltWith specializes in web technology tracking.
- [TheirStack vs Coresignal](https://theirstack.com/en/docs/comparisons/theirstack-vs-coresignal): Compare TheirStack and Coresignal to find the best job data solution. While Coresignal offers extensive datasets and APIs for company, employee, and job data, TheirStack provides a comprehensive, real-time job data platform with advanced filtering, instant results, and seamless integration. Discover which solution best fits your needs in this detailed comparison guide.
- [TheirStack vs FantasticJobs](https://theirstack.com/en/docs/comparisons/theirstack-vs-fantasticjobs): Compare TheirStack and FantasticJobs to find the best job data solution.
- [TheirStack vs PredictLeads](https://theirstack.com/en/docs/comparisons/theirstack-vs-predictleads): Compare TheirStack and PredictLeads to find the best solution for your business needs. TheirStack offers a real-time job data platform, while PredictLeads provides comprehensive company intelligence data. Discover which solution best fits your needs in this detailed comparison guide.
- [TheirStack vs Similarweb](https://theirstack.com/en/docs/comparisons/theirstack-vs-similarweb): Compare TheirStack and Similarweb to find the best solution for your needs. Learn how TheirStack offers technographic data and real-time webhooks, while SimilarWeb specializes in web traffic and market intelligence.
- [TheirStack vs Wappalyzer](https://theirstack.com/en/docs/comparisons/theirstack-vs-wappalyzer): Compare TheirStack and Wappalyzer to find the best solution for your needs. Learn how TheirStack offers technographic data and real-time webhooks, while Wappalyzer specializes in website technology profiling.

## integrations

- [Clay](https://theirstack.com/en/docs/integrations/clay): How to add a new column in Clay table with TheirStack data and how to create a new table in Clay with TheirStack data.
- [Make](https://theirstack.com/en/docs/integrations/make): How to connect TheirStack with Slack or any other tool through Make

## guides

- [Adding a technology or job filter to your company search](https://theirstack.com/en/docs/guides/adding-technology-filter-to-search): Learn how to add a technology or job filter to your search.
- [Backfilling a job board](https://theirstack.com/en/docs/guides/backfill-job-board): Learn why TheirStack is the best job board backfill solution and how to backfill a job board using webhooks
- [How to periodically fetch jobs using the Jobs API](https://theirstack.com/en/docs/guides/fetch-jobs-periodically): This guide demonstrates how to periodically fetch jobs from the TheirStack API, ensuring fresh data and minimizing API costs.
- [How to enrich a list of companies with their tech stack](https://theirstack.com/en/docs/guides/how-to-enrich-a-list-of-companies-with-their-tech-stack): Learn how to easily enrich a list of companies with their specific technology stacks using our step-by-step guide. Discover the tools and techniques to quickly gather valuable tech insights for your business needs.
- [How to find old jobs](https://theirstack.com/en/docs/guides/how-to-find-old-jobs): Learn how to find old job postings from any company. Discover two methods: using our company lookup feature to see all jobs from a specific company, or performing a new job search and filtering by date. Old job postings can be a valuable source of information.
- [How to identify companies with problems your software solves](https://theirstack.com/en/docs/guides/how-to-identify-companies-with-problems-your-software-solves): Learn how to use job postings to discover companies actively hiring for tasks your software automates. Find your ideal customers by analyzing 300M+ job descriptions for specific pain points and manual processes.
- [Outreach companies actively hiring](https://theirstack.com/en/docs/guides/how-to-outreach-on-autopilot-to-companies-actively-hiring): How to outreach companies actively hiring on autopilot using TheirStack
- [How to send a slack message for every new job found](https://theirstack.com/en/docs/guides/how-to-send-jobs-to-slack): Step-by-step guide to automatically notify your team in Slack whenever new jobs are posted using TheirStack's webhook integration with Make, Zapier, or N8n.
- [Monitoring open jobs from current and past customers](https://theirstack.com/en/docs/guides/monitoring-open-jobs-from-current-and-past-customers): How to know which companies from a given list are actively hiring. This can help SaaS companies detect new needs of their current customers for potential upsells, and also recruitment companies to find old customers that are hiring again and could be easier to sell to than if they were completely new customers.
- [Integration guide for sales intelligence software](https://theirstack.com/en/docs/guides/sales-software-integration-guide): This guide provides detailed instructions on integrating TheirStack into your product, including all possible connectors, marketing content and best practices.

## legal

- [Cookies Policy](https://theirstack.com/en/docs/legal/cookies-policy): Cookies Policy for TheirStack
- [GDPR](https://theirstack.com/en/docs/legal/gdpr): Ensuring GDPR compliance, TheirStack.com prioritizes lawful data processing, transparency, data minimization, robust security, and respect for individual rights. Our practices include regular audits to maintain the highest standards of data protection and privacy.
- [Privacy Policy](https://theirstack.com/en/docs/legal/privacy-policy): Privacy Policy for TheirStack
- [Refunds and Cancellations](https://theirstack.com/en/docs/legal/refunds-and-cancellations): Refunds and Cancellations Policy for TheirStack
- [Terms and Conditions](https://theirstack.com/en/docs/legal/terms-and-conditions): Terms and Conditions for TheirStack

## pricing-and-billing

- [Affiliate Program](https://theirstack.com/en/docs/pricing-and-billing/affiliate-program): Learn how TheirStack's Affiliate Program lets you earn up to 20% commission by referring new customers. Discover how payouts work, the commission structure, and how to get started.
- [Auto recharge credits](https://theirstack.com/en/docs/pricing-and-billing/auto-recharge-credits): Learn how to set up auto rechage rules to prevent running out of credits in production
- [Credits](https://theirstack.com/en/docs/pricing-and-billing/credits): Learn the difference between API credits and company credits and how to view your credit usage.
- [Pricing FAQs](https://theirstack.com/en/docs/pricing-and-billing/faqs): Frequently asked questions about our pricing.

## data

- [Data workflow](https://theirstack.com/en/docs/data/job/data-workflow): Steps we follow to source job data
- [Freshness & Scraping Frequency](https://theirstack.com/en/docs/data/job/freshness): Learn how often we update our tech job listings and company data to ensure you have access to the most current opportunities
- [Job Data](https://theirstack.com/en/docs/data/job): Learn about the job data available in TheirStack.
- [Job sources](https://theirstack.com/en/docs/data/job/sources): Our platform aggregates job listings from over 16,000 different websites. Below you'll find a breakdown of our largest job data sources and their contributions.
- [Job status (active, closed)](https://theirstack.com/en/docs/data/job/status): 
- [How we source tech stack data](https://theirstack.com/en/docs/data/technographic/how-we-source-tech-stack-data): We infer technology usage from millions of jobs worldwide and give you some statistics on it.
- [Technographic Data](https://theirstack.com/en/docs/data/technographic): Learn about the technographic data available in TheirStack.
